titleStmt.title: A Fragment of Plutarch's Coniugalia Praecepta

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Looks good. Delete lost.4lin in i.1; .encode 1[.?]α in i.7; use outdent in ii.8 instead of ||left:||; put the whole word in subst tags in ii.8; delete text at end of ii.8; separate square brackets in ii.9; put dot of fr. 2.1 in left margin; regularize in fr. 2.2; add editorial period before scribal high-punctus in fr. 2.3; use subst tags around whole word in fr. 2.4; add editorial circumflex in fr. 2.5; add [.?] to beginning of fr. 3.1; add editorial comma before middot of fr. 3.5; remove ed tags in fr. 3.8 (the mss. reading is a conjecture); add [.?] to beginning of fr. 4.1; remove quotation marks in fr. 4.2-3; add diacriticals and remove ed tags in fr. 4.3 (the reading is in Stobaeus); fix typo at end of fr. 4.3; accent κοινῶς in fr. 4.5; add [.?] to end of fr. 4.8; remove ed tags in fr. 4.8 (the reading is shared by codd.). Review all metadata before finalization.
Submit - Added text from ed. pr., as follow-up to 2022 Ottawa DCLP Workshop
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Looks good. Delete lost.4lin in i.1; .encode 1[.?]α in i.7; use outdent in ii.8 instead of ||left:||; put the whole word in subst tags in ii.8; delete text at end of ii.8; separate square brackets in ii.9; put dot of fr. 2.1 in left margin; regularize in fr. 2.2; add editorial period before scribal high-punctus in fr. 2.3; use subst tags around whole word in fr. 2.4; add editorial circumflex in fr. 2.5; add [.?] to beginning of fr. 3.1; add editorial comma before middot of fr. 3.5; remove ed tags in fr. 3.8 (the mss. reading is a conjecture); add [.?] to beginning of fr. 4.1; remove quotation marks in fr. 4.2-3; add diacriticals and remove ed tags in fr. 4.3 (the reading is in Stobaeus); fix typo at end of fr. 4.3; accent κοινῶς in fr. 4.5; add [.?] to end of fr. 4.8; remove ed tags in fr. 4.8 (the reading is shared by codd.). Review all metadata before finalization.
Submit - Added text from ed. pr., as follow-up to 2022 Ottawa DCLP Workshop
